title: Square shape bare land in Rathmaldeniya road,pannipitiya
details: Clear title with approved plan,10 perch square block land,facing to the temple road,rathmaldeniya road,pannipitiya,20 FEET very wide road,per perch Rs 625,000/= Price can negotiate seriesly interesting buyers only,no time wasters please,,call Mr Subuhan 0766674618,view prior appointment please.
